price: Йўқ! Албатта, улар ўша кунда Парвардигорларидан тўсилгувчидирлар!
arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّهُمۡ عَن رَّبِّهِمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّمَحۡجُوبُونَ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: kallā innahum ʿan rabbihim yawma-idhin lamaḥjūbūna
